name: animation-page-transition
description: Page transition wrapper with multiple animation presets -- fade, slide, scale, and flip. Drop-in wrapper for route transitions in React apps.
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { PageTransition } from './components/animation-page-transition/PageTransition';

// Wrap each page/route with a unique key to trigger AnimatePresence:
<PageTransition key={location.pathname} preset="slide" direction="left">
  <YourPageContent />
</PageTransition>

Note: The `key` prop is essential. AnimatePresence detects route changes
by tracking when keyed children mount/unmount. Use `location.pathname`
(react-router) or `router.asPath` (Next.js) as the key.
